original_text: Their webs shall not become garments, neither shall they cover themselves with their works: their works are works of iniquity, and the act of violence is in their hands.
korean_text: 그 짠 것으로는 옷을 이룰 수 없을 것이요 그 행위로는 자기를 가릴 수 없을 것이며 그 행위는 죄악의 행위라 그 손에는 포악한 행동이 있으며

sentences.original_text: Their webs shall not become garments
sentences.korean_translation: 그들의 그물은 옷이 되지 못할 것이며

sentences.original_text: neither shall they cover themselves with their works
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들의 행위로 자신을 덮지도 못하리라

sentences.original_text: their works are works of iniquity
and act of violence is in their hands
